Reviews.Title: outside 600 lines camera
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: Camera was added to a 4 camera setup.  Have had NO problems after 4 / 5 months.  I had to add a sun shade as lens looked into the sun (north-west) in evening.  Would have happened with any other camera as well.  I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful and pricey camera
Reviews.Author: Len
Reviews.Content: The camera far surpasses my expectations. It worked great together with my surveillance system. Easy installation. The video quality is very good, great visibility in the dark. so high quality image from this camera I have seen.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor CCtv camera wide angle color Brown. 600tvl
Reviews.Author: jw "MAD"
Reviews.Content: I ordered the videosec 600tv lines IR camera 1I8 $84.99 from Warehouseseller it is brownish in color and came with a power adapter. I have had this for a week now. Compared to another camera I am using "VideoSecu Bullet Outdoor CCD Security Camera Day Night 26 IR Infrared LEDs With Free Power Supply 1Z8 $44.99". The 600tvl 1I8 is a heavier larger camera has a wider lens a little sharper overall quality is a step up. for a sub $100.00 camera it has a solid feel to it. The night vision is great the LEDS.the picture is excellent wider and  better than the 39.00 video sec. Overall both cameras are what they are for under $100.00 I would buy another 1I8. If needed.

Reviews.Title: Not a Helmet Camera Kit!
Reviews.Author: M. Gramza "jjones"
Reviews.Content: This is simply a security camera.  It has no mic or battery pack!  Useless as a helmet type camera setup.
